sections.text:
86-1057.Telecommunications relay services, defined.

Telecommunications relay services has the same meaning as in 47 C.F.R. 9.3, as such regulation existed on January 1, 2024.

SourceLaws 2024, LB1031, ยง 10;R.S.1943, (2024), ยง 86-1024.01;Laws 2025, LB362, ยง 39.Effective Date: September 3, 2025
